pmdplyr 0.1.1
  • Reference

Reference

Overview

pmdplyr

pmdplyr package

Setting panel structure

as_pdeclare()

Coerce to a pdeclare tibble

is_pdeclare()

Function to check whether an object has been declared as panel data

pdeclare

pdeclare

dplyr verb variants for pdeclare objects

inexact_inner_join() inexact_left_join() inexact_right_join() inexact_full_join() inexact_semi_join() inexact_nest_join() inexact_anti_join()

Function to join two data frames inexactly

mutate_cascade()

Function to perform mutate one time period at a time ('Cascading mutate')

mutate_subset()

Function to propogate a calculation performed on a subset of data to the rest of the data

Panel data tools

id_variable()

Function to create a single panel ID variable out of several

fixed_check()

Function to check for inconsistency in variables that should be fixed

fixed_force()

Function to enforce consistency in variables

within_i() between_i()

Functions to perform standard panel-data calculations

panel_fill()

Function to fill in gaps in panel data

panel_locf()

Function to fill in missing (or other) values using known data

time_variable()

Function to create a pmdplyr-consistent time variable

tlag()

Function to retrieve time-lagged data

Datasets

Scorecard

Data on Earnings and Loan Repayment in US Four-Year Colleges

SPrail

Data on 2,000 Spanish train trips

pdeclare methods for dplyr verbs

mutate(<tbl_pd>) mutate_all(<tbl_pd>) mutate_at(<tbl_pd>) mutate_if(<tbl_pd>) distinct(<tbl_pd>) group_by(<tbl_pd>) group_by_all(<tbl_pd>) group_by_all(<tbl_pd>) group_by_at(<tbl_pd>) group_by_if(<tbl_pd>) ungroup(<tbl_pd>) bind_cols(<tbl_pd>) intersect(<tbl_pd>) union(<tbl_pd>) union_all(<tbl_pd>) setdiff(<tbl_pd>) left_join(<tbl_pd>) inner_join(<tbl_pd>) right_join(<tbl_pd>) full_join(<tbl_pd>) semi_join(<tbl_pd>) nest_join(<tbl_pd>) anti_join(<tbl_pd>) select(<tbl_pd>) select_all(<tbl_pd>) select_at(<tbl_pd>) select_if(<tbl_pd>) rename(<tbl_pd>) rename_all(<tbl_pd>) rename_at(<tbl_pd>) rename_if(<tbl_pd>) summarize(<tbl_pd>) summarize_all(<tbl_pd>) summarize_at(<tbl_pd>) summarize_if(<tbl_pd>) summarise(<tbl_pd>) summarise_all(<tbl_pd>) summarise_at(<tbl_pd>) summarise_if(<tbl_pd>) transmute(<tbl_pd>) transmute_all(<tbl_pd>) transmute_at(<tbl_pd>) transmute_if(<tbl_pd>)
